context: Global pharmaceutical company facing increasing regulatory scrutiny on supply chain transparency, considering major investment in blockchain-based supply chain tracking system

request.purpose: Implementation of blockchain-based supply chain traceability platform for raw materials and finished products
request.justification: Upcoming EU FMD regulation requirements, recent FDA warning letters, counterfeit drug concerns in supply chain

decision_process.outcome: Identified critical compliance gaps requiring immediate action
Selected enterprise blockchain solution with pharmaceutical validation
80% supplier commitment with phased adoption plan

business_impact.expected_outcome: 100% supply chain traceability, reduced regulatory risk, enhanced product authenticity verification
business_impact.projected_value: $500,000 annual cost savings from compliance efficiency

lessons_learned: Early supplier engagement critical for blockchain adoption, comprehensive training programs essential, phased implementation reduces operational disruption
